collections.collectionDescription: This Collection contains the full information of schools and the students studying in that schools and their leave informations

field_descriptions.leaveId: Unique identifier for a specific leave request.
field_descriptions.leaveType: The category of leave requested by the student (e.g., 'Sick Leave', 'Personal Leave', 'Vacation Leave').
field_descriptions.leaveStartDateUnix: The Unix timestamp (seconds since epoch) representing the start date of the leave.
field_descriptions.leaveEndDateUnix: The Unix timestamp (seconds since epoch) representing the end date of the leave.
field_descriptions.leaveStatus: The current approval status of the leave application (e.g., 'Pending', 'Approved', 'Rejected').
field_descriptions.leaveReasonText: The detailed reason provided by the student for their leave request.
field_descriptions.leaveApprovedByStaffId: The unique ID of the staff member who approved the leave request. This field can be null if the leave is not yet approved.
field_descriptions.leaveIsEmergency: A boolean flag indicating whether the leave request is considered an emergency (true) or not (false).
field_descriptions.leaveSubmissionTimestamp: The Unix timestamp (seconds since epoch) when the leave request was submitted.
field_descriptions.studentName: The full name of the student.
field_descriptions.studentGradeLevel: The academic grade level of the student (e.g., 8, 9, 10, 11, 12).
field_descriptions.studentEnrollmentDateUnix: The Unix timestamp (seconds since epoch) when the student enrolled in the school.
field_descriptions.studentIsActive: A boolean flag indicating whether the student is currently active (true) or inactive (false).
field_descriptions.studentContactEmail: The primary email address for student contact.
field_descriptions.studentParentContact: Contact information for the student's parent or guardian.
field_descriptions.schoolName: The official name of the school the student attends.
field_descriptions.schoolAddressLine1: The first line of the school's street address.
field_descriptions.schoolCity: The city where the school is located.
field_descriptions.schoolState: The state where the school is located.
field_descriptions.schoolZipCode: The postal code of the school's location.
field_descriptions.schoolEstablishedYear: The year the school was officially established. This is a numerical year (e.g., 1985, 2000).

records.leaveReasonText: Attending a local festival (conflict with school event).

collections.collectionDescription: This Collection containsthe employees and other information about the employee.

field_descriptions.employeeName: The full name of the employee.
field_descriptions.employeeRole: The role or position of the employee (e.g., 'Teacher', 'Administrator', 'Support Staff').
field_descriptions.employeeDepartment: The department the employee belongs to (e.g., 'Mathematics', 'Human Resources', 'Operations').
field_descriptions.employeeHireDateUnix: The Unix timestamp (seconds since epoch) when the employee was hired.
field_descriptions.employeeIsActive: A boolean flag indicating whether the employee is currently active (true) or inactive (false).
field_descriptions.employeeContactEmail: The primary email address for employee contact.
field_descriptions.employeePhone: The primary phone number for the employee (10 digits, Indian standard).
field_descriptions.employeeSalary: The employee's annual gross salary (base salary).
field_descriptions.ctc: The annual Cost To Company (CTC) of the employee, typically including salary, benefits, and other allowances, represented as a whole number.
field_descriptions.managerId: The ID of the employee's direct manager (if applicable). This field can be null.
field_descriptions.certifications: A comma-separated list of certifications held by the employee (e.g., 'CPR, First Aid'). This field can be null.
field_descriptions.gender: The gender of the employee (e.g., 'Male', 'Female', 'Non-binary', 'Prefer not to say').
